scripts.setup: npm run create-dirs && npm run create-files && npm run create-compress-script
scripts.create-dirs: mkdir dist src src\scss src\img src\js dist\img
scripts.create-files: type nul > dist\script.min.js && type nul > dist\style.min.css && type nul > src\scss\style.scss && type nul > src\js\script.js && echo node_modules > .gitignore && echo compress-images.js >> .gitignore
scripts.watch: nodemon --watch src --ext scss,js -x "npm run compile-scss && npm run minify-js"
scripts.dev: npm run compile-scss && npm run minify-js
scripts.create-compress-script: echo import i from'imagemin';import m from'imagemin-mozjpeg';import g from'imagemin-pngquant';import o from'imagemin-svgo';import n from'glob';!async function(){let p=await i(n.sync('src/img/**/*.{jpg,jpeg,png,svg,webp}'),{destination:'dist/img',plugins:[m(),g(),o()]});console.log('Images optimized:',p)}(); > compress-images.js
